# Mantle of Law (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Lawful Spells|lawful]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Mechanus (Domain)|Mechanus]] 3, [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 138

*You invoke the powers of law, and a constant blue field of axiomatic energy surrounds you.*

This spell functions like *[[Mantle of Chaos (Spell)|mantle of chaos]]*, except that *mantle of law* grants spell resistance against spells with the chaotic descriptor.
